title: £4m fund to kick-start the next ‘Tomb Raider’ (UK Department for Culture, Media and Sport) ...
text: ( Source : UK Department for Culture , Media and Sport ) A new £4 million fund to help boost the UK's growing video games industry has been launched by Government today (Monday 12 October ). Aimed at helping smaller companies get concepts off
